channel.title: Exo-PK 317 Source And Client Release! Please click here link fix
channel.description:
[center][Things I Have Completed!][/center] [center]1. Added Ring of Flying 2. Added Bank PIN 3. Added Setemail 4. Added Double Xp Ring 5. Fix Ring of Wealth 6. Fix EntityDef.java so you can add custom npc. 7. Change Donator zone to donator island 8. Added Torva Npc at donator island 9. Added 4 new portal at donator island 10. Added donator wings Donator only 11. Added Weed cape Donator only 12. Added different color santa hats 13. Added bank at donator islands 14. Added range at donator islands 15. Added fishing spot at donator islands 16. Added pk chest points 17. Fix npc facing 18. Added Dragon lairs 19. Added Dragon point shop 20. player now can work on their summoning by killing wolf. 21. Added a teleport to tele to the wolf to start on summoning. 22. Added reggae wings & reggae claws. 23. Fix mining you now can dragon pickaxe 24. Added Forgotten warrior 25. Added Bork 26. Added Nex 27. Added auto donation system. 28. make reggae wings for donator only. 29. change pk point shop.(make it better) 30. change donator point shop (make it better) 31. Added status to custom items. 32. Change skills area type ::skills in game. 33. Added npc boss & drop at barrows 34. Fix npc making them fight normal and not wired 35. Added God wars & tele type ::god1 ::god2 ::god3 ::god4 in game to get too god wars 36. Added a faster way to level your dungeoning just type::dung in game to get there 37. Added dangerous pk type::pk in game 38. Increase forgotten warrior hit rate making drain players prayer point by 22 39. Forgotten warrior have 4 hit point must kill him 4 for him to die.. 40. Added Giant Roc at King Black Dragon 41. fix basket of eggs 42. fix godsword making them dismantle. 43. rock crab drop crystal keys type ::train to get their 44. Added noclip commands 45. Add a New skills aera type ::skills to get their 46. Fix Agility at the skill area just climb-down ladder at skill 47. Added a new rank called Helper 48. fix crown for the helper rank 49. All teleport npc drop now. 50. Added Frost teleport at new home. 51. lootshare working 100% 52. dicing system working 100% 53. Added Auto update cache working 100% 54. Add items show on death 55. fix farming & Herblore at new skilling area 56. Add Auto Joining clan. 57. fix bank pin set. type ::setpin in game. 58. fix email set. type ::setemail in game.
Rank: 0 - Players 1 - Mod 2 - Co-Owner 3 - Main Owner 4 - Donator 5 - Admin 6 - Super donator 7 - helper[/center]
Credit : Trisidia 5% Exo & Xo 95% Skype : Jrummusic
Things that need to add Grand Exchange God Wars Dungeons Nex Places
[center]Links:[/center] Pictures :[url=https://www.dropbox.com/sh/vjnk7izrq5h8a13/AAAUG45HCpMrhSI2CH8Uxikja?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/sh/vjnk7izrq5h8a13/AAAUG45HCpMrhSI2cccCH8Uxikja?dl=0[/url] Package Source + Client, Cache Auto [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/if21soijrocr8bl/Package%20Source%20%2B%20Client%2C%20Cache%20Auto%20Download.zip?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/if21soijrocr8bl/Package%20Source%20%2B%20Client%2C%20Cache%20Auto%20Download.zip?dl=0[/url]

item.title: Exo-PK 317 Source And Client Release! Please click here link fix
item.dc:creator: @GfServerMaker1 GfServerMaker1
item.description:
@GfServerMaker1 wrote:

[quote=“ISUB, post:22, topic:549413”][quote author=GfServerMaker1 link=topic=668316.msg4473887#msg4473887 date=1424639414]
this is actually a wonderful source, it isn’t bad, but guess what, it’s not a big version. the higher the version number, the better it will be

Scanned it with multiple virus detectors, even one that was created by me…
[/quote]

Higher the revision the* better, are you stupid?

Judging by the first comment stated. Your “virus detector” is most likely a text file that has “@echo tell me if this is a virus” written in it.[/quote]

No im not stupid, get to know someone before judging them.

Read full topic
